::Zardus/Perndabot/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer::

Zardus growls, ducking under a shot. With a suddent thrust forward, he grabs 
Iron Raptor, getting to his feet with his gun pressed to her head.

"Allright," he says in a deadly voice as Perndabot, Reptilica, and 
Bloodystrike open fire on Tritan and co. "All of you are going to retreat 
now. If you choose not to, this maximal dies."

Zardus takes a few steps back, keeping an eye on the attackers. "Perndabot, 
call DevilDuer over here."

The huge bot nods, activating his comm-link and continuing to fire on Tritan 
with one rifle and Shocker with another. "Devil," he says into his comm-link, 
"Zardus has requested your presense."

Bloodystrike and Reptilica fire on Icedemon and Falcore.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Inside the Alliance base, DevilDuer is interrupted from a nap on one of the 
comp terminals by Perndabot's transmission.

"Oh, allright, I'm on my way," he says, walking out of the base and taking 
off at a run to Zardus' position.
